properties.entry:
SELECT RNUM , USER_ID , CHALL_NO , CHALL_STATUS , JOIN_CALL_DATE , CHALL_TITLE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_START , STATUS ,CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) END_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, CE.* FROM(SELECT CS.USER_ID, CHALL_NO, CS.CHALL_STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE, CHALL_TITLE, FILE_PATH, CHALL_PERIOD, CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL_STATUS CS JOIN CHALL USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE CS.USER_ID = ? AND CS.CHALL_STATUS != 0 ORDER BY STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE DESC)CE WHERE STATUS != 0)
WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
